mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kfashion_user_group_authority ( authority_no, group_no, created_datetime, updated_datetime ) VALUES ( #{authorityNo}, #{groupNo}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT kfashion_user_group_authority.authority_no, kfashion_user_group_authority.group_no, kfashion_user_group_authority.created_datetime, kfashion_user_group_authority.updated_datetime, kfashion_user_authority.authority_name, kfashion_user_group.group_name FROM kfashion_user_group_authority LEFT JOIN kfashion_user_authority ON kfashion_user_group_authority.authority_no = kfashion_user_authority.no RIGHT JOIN kfashion_user_group ON kfashion_user_group_authority.group_no = kfashion_user_group.no ORDER BY kfashion_user_group_authority.group_no ASC
